data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Notosemus Förster, 1869 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ichneumoninae) from China, with a key to the world species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sheng, Mao-Ling, Sun, Shu-Ping, Zhang, Ying, Liang, Yan-Ping (2016): Three new species of the genus Notosemus Förster, 1869 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Ichneumoninae) from China, with a key to the world species. European Journal of Taxonomy 209: 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2016.209
